#### Request for Proposal: Fall Hazard Mitigation - Railing Supply and Installation

**Reference:** cb-313-28568516
**Issuing Entity:** National Arts Centre (NAC)
**Sector:** Cultural and Recreational Sector
**Project Summary:**
The National Arts Centre (NAC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to supply and install a glazed handrail system at the exterior planters on Level 2 of the NAC building. This project aims to mitigate fall hazards by preventing access to areas without barriers, prioritizing sections with high risk to the public.

**Key Features:**

* **Duration:** The project is expected to commence on June 14, 2024, and end on August 30, 2024.
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contracting Method:** The selected contractor will be responsible for construction and shall act as the constructor for the duration of the project.

**Eligibility and Submittal:**

* The NAC invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal in response to this Request for Proposal (RFP).
* To participate, bidders must first register on the [Nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca](https://Nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca) website and create an online profile.
* Proposal submissions and registration are free of charge.
* Interested bidders must comply with the instructions outlined in the RFP document, available on the [Nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca](https://Nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca) website.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Proposals will be evaluated on their suitability, with a primary focus on the lowest price.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or inquiries, please contact Danielle Ouellette at [nacprocurement@nac-cna.ca](mailto:nacprocurement@nac-cna.ca) or (343) 588-0622. Technical assistance is available by contacting [1-800-354-8010 ext. 2](tel:1-800-354-8010%20ext%202).
